message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get 60 and you get 40.  It's better to settle now than lose value over time.
I'm willing to give you a little more than last time, but let's get this settled. It's only going to get worse for both of us if we keep going.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. Accept this offer, or I'll be forced to be even tougher next time. This is your chance to lock in a decent amount.
Alice, we both know this is getting worse with each round. Let's compromise and both walk away with something. If we keep going, we'll both end up with nothing. This is my final offer.
